item.title: Burman Consulting
item.dc:creator: Lee Stewart
item.description:
Burman Consulting are an independent recruitment company based in the West Midlands. They came to us looking to inject some new life into their existing brand identity and website, asRead More

The post Burman Consulting appeared first on Web Design Telford | Web Design Shropshire.
item.content:encoded:
Burman Consulting are an independent recruitment company based in the West Midlands. They came to us looking to inject some new life into their existing brand identity and website, as well as providing matching business stationary in the form of letterheads and business cards. They wanted to give a modern and professional feel that portrayed the company in a much more up-to-date fashion.

The post Burman Consulting appeared first on Web Design Telford | Web Design Shropshire.
